resources.string: SELECT Emoji.code, Emoji.has_tone, Emoji.tone, Emoji.emoji_order, Category.category FROM Emoji JOIN Category ON (Emoji.category_id = Category.id)
SELECT Emoji.code FROM Emoji WHERE Emoji.id IN (
SELECT Emoji.id FROM Emoji JOIN Emoji_Keyword ON (Emoji.id = Emoji_Keyword.emoji_id) JOIN Keyword ON (Emoji_Keyword.keyword_id = Keyword.id) WHERE Keyword.keyword LIKE "
" INTERSECT SELECT Emoji.id FROM Emoji JOIN Emoji_Keyword ON (Emoji.id = Emoji_Keyword.emoji_id) JOIN Keyword ON (Emoji_Keyword.keyword_id = Keyword.id) WHERE Keyword.keyword LIKE "
